refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a PHP value from a stored representation from msgpack_serialize

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.errors;
Objects may throw Throwables in their unserialization handlers.

&reftitle.notes;
&false; is returned both in the case of an error and if unserializing the serialized &false; value. It is possible to catch this special case by comparing str with msgpack_serialize(false) or by catching the issued E_NOTICE and E_WARNING.

&reftitle.seealso;
msgpack_serialize unserialize igbinary_unserialize json_encode json_decode hash_hmac Autoloading Classes unserialize_callback_func __wakeup() __serialize() __unserialize()
